hero.name: The Devil
hero.specialAbility:
After any action, if 2 DEADLY SIN cards are in your discard pile, remove them from the game. 

Draw the top card of an opponent's deck and choose to put it on the top or bottom of their deck.

sidekick.name: Sidekick
sidekick.quote:
“The greatest trick the Devil ever pulled was convincing the world he didn’t exist.”
                                       —Charles Baudelaire

cards.title: A Deal With The Devil
cards.basicText:
Select an opponent, both the Devil and the opponent choose 1 effect:
➣  gain 1 action
➣  draw 2 cards
➣  gain 2 health 
Place this card in front of your opponent.

cards.title: The Devil is in the Details
cards.basicText:
Select an opponent with A DEAL WITH THE DEVIL card, they must choose 2 effects:
➣  lose 1 action next turn
➣  discard 2 cards
➣  hero loses 2 health
Discard A DEAL WITH THE DEVIL.

cards.title: Speak of the Devil
cards.basicText:
Place the Devil adjacent to an opposing fighter. Deal 1 damage to that fighter. The opponent must choose 1 effect: 
➣  the Devil gains 1 action 
➣  the Devil draws 2 cards

cards.title: Deadly Sin: Wrath
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this attack with a random card from your hand.

cards.title: Deadly Sin: Envy
cards.afterText: If the Devil took combat damage, deal an equal amount of damage to the opposing fighter.

cards.title: Deadly Sin: Gluttony
cards.afterText: Your opponent draws 1 card and then discards 2 cards.

cards.title: Deadly Sin: lust
cards.afterText: Place the opposing fighter in a space adjacent to the Devil. If the Devil lost the combat, the opponent loses 1 of their remaining actions.

cards.title: Deadly Sin: sloth
cards.afterText: Your opponent has a movement of 0 until the end of their next turn.

cards.title: Deadly Sin: pride
cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 2 damage to the opposing fighter.

cards.title: Deadly Sin: greed
cards.afterText: Draw 2 cards. Your opponent may choose to draw up to 3 cards and receive 2 damage per card.

cards.title: Better the Devil you Know
cards.afterText:
Your opponent must choose 1 effect: 
➣  reveal their hand, take 0 damage   
➣  reveal the Devil's hand, take 1 damage

cards.title: Idle Hands are the Devil's PlayThings
cards.afterText:
If your opponent has 4 or more cards, they must choose 1 effect:
➣  discard 1 random card
➣  discard 2 cards of their choice

cards.title: Luck of the DEVIL
cards.afterText: Gain 2 health. Move the Devil up to 5 spaces. You may move the Devil through spaces containing opposing fighters.

cards.title: The number of the beast
cards.duringText: If the value of your opponent's card is 3, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter.

cards.title: feint
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

ruleCards.content:
Any 2 DEADLY SIN cards in the discard pile trigger the Devil's special ability.

If triggered, the Devil's special ability occurs after any player's action (Attack, Defend, Scheme, or Maneuveur).

Should a card effect or character abilty cause the Devil to have 4 or more DEADLY SIN cards in the discard pile, the Devil's ability triggers until 0 or 1 DEADLY SIN cards remain.
ruleCards.title: THE Devil's Deadly Sins
